short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension helps you explore Medium.com if you are in a country or organization that blocks it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By redirecting all Medium.com blogs to a mirror website, you can now explore the blog even if you were unable to access it due to ISP or organizational restrictions.
